014package org.jdbi.v3.core.argument;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Type;
017import java.util.Objects;
018import java.util.Optional;
019import java.util.function.Function;
020
021import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
022
023/**
024 * Argument factory that matches a specified type and binds
025 * it as an {@link ObjectArgument}.
026 */
027public class ObjectArgumentFactory implements ArgumentFactory.Preparable {
028    /**
029     * Match the given type and bind as an object without SQL type information.
030     * @param type the Java type to match
031     * @return an ArgumentFactory that produces ObjectArguments for values of the supplied type
032     */
033    public static ArgumentFactory create(Class<?> type) {
034        return create(type, null);
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Match the given type and bind as an object with the given SQL type information
039     * @param type the Java type to match
040     * @param sqlType the SQL type to bind
041     * @return an ArgumentFactory that produces ObjectArguments for values of the supplied type
042     * @see java.sql.Types
043     */
044    public static ArgumentFactory create(Class<?> type, Integer sqlType) {
045        return new ObjectArgumentFactory(type, sqlType);
046    }
047
048    private final Class<?> type;
049    private final Integer sqlType;
050
051    private ObjectArgumentFactory(Class<?> type, Integer sqlType) {
052        this.type = type;
053        this.sqlType = sqlType;
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public Optional<Function<Object, Argument>> prepare(Type expectedType, ConfigRegistry config) {
058        return Optional.of(expectedType)
059                .filter(type::equals)
060                .map(t -> o -> ObjectArgument.of(o, sqlType));
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public Optional<Argument> build(Type expectedType, Object value, ConfigRegistry config) {
065        return Objects.equals(type, expectedType) || type.isInstance(value)
066                ? Optional.of(ObjectArgument.of(value, sqlType))
067                : Optional.empty();
068    }
069}
